item.description:
You Asked. We listened. Dj Hitz is back by Popular Demand this Friday at Caprice.

As always, ladies free before 11PM with RSVP.

GenerationDesi presents DESI FRIDAYS in Downtown Boston at Caprice Lounge in the Marriot Hotel.

With 2 floors of Music. Get there early. We hit capacity by Midnight every Friday

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

1st Floor: Top 40/ Hip Hop

2nd Floor: Bollywood ~Bhangra~Mashups w/ Dj Hitz (Back by Popular Demand)

Get ready to dance the nite away.

Where: Caprice Boston, 248 Tremont st ~ Boston ,MA Dress Code: Proper dress.

“Upscale dress code is required” NO Sneakers, NO Sports Apparel & NO Baggie Attire. Please Dress to Impress.

Age: 21+

Cover $10 only on the Guestlist by emailing: Generationdesi@gmail.com Ladies Free before 11:00 PM with RSVP: Generationdesi@gmail.com
item.name: Dj Hitz Take Over @ Caprice Friday
